subtests.name: Constructing a CSSOKLCH with percent for the lightness works as intended.
CSSOKLCH.l can be updated with a percent.
Constructing a CSSOKLCH with number for the lightness works as intended.
CSSOKLCH.l can be updated with a number.
Constructing a CSSOKLCH with css pixels for lightness throws a SyntaxError.
Constructing a CSSOKLCH with degrees for lightness throws a SyntaxError.
CSSOKLCH can be constructed from three numbers and will get an alpha of 100%.
CSSOKLCH can be constructed from four numbers.
Constructing a CSSOKLCH with CSS.number for l, c, h or alpha throws a SyntaxError
Updating a CSSOKLCH with CSS.number for l throws a SyntaxError
CSSOKLCH.l can be updated to a number.
CSSOKLCH.l can be updated with a CSS percent.
Updating a CSSOKLCH with CSS.number for c throws a SyntaxError
CSSOKLCH.c can be updated to a number.
CSSOKLCH.c can be updated with a CSS percent.
Updating a CSSOKLCH with CSS.number for alpha throws a SyntaxError
CSSOKLCH.alpha can be updated to a number.
CSSOKLCH.alpha can be updated with a CSS percent.
